channel.title: [REQ] Can any one send me the RSMV w/converter
channel.description: Can anyone send me a model converter or RSMV 3.0 cuz I have made some sick models to use for servers I just need to convert them to get them to work on the server

item.title: [REQ] Can any one send me the RSMV w/converter
item.dc:creator: @Gone_Rastafari Gone_Rastafari
item.description:
@Gone_Rastafari wrote:

well compared to you yes cuz i know your work but to the “average joe” im pretty experienced, im big into client making and model making ha but yea i might need to study up on this one

Read full topic
item.source: [REQ] Can any one send me the RSMV w/converter

item.title: [REQ] Can any one send me the RSMV w/converter
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Alot of what you need lays in the RuneScape Client. Find out how they load their models, learn their format, learn lets say *.3ds (3DSMAX) format, and then write a converter between the two. No offence, but to be honest, you are still to unexperienced to write something like this.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Can any one send me the RSMV w/converter
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

You’ll have to write the converter plugin for it youself, it’s not included.
It’s on moparisthebest.com/smf, by the way.
